name: exodia.world-desktop-client
description: Desktop client for Exodia.World, the largest decentralized gaming marketplace.

scripts.restart: cd app && ng build && cd .. && node setup.js
scripts.copy.metamask.prod: cp -R extensions your-app/dist && cp extensions.js your-app/dist && cp main.js your-app/dist
scripts.download.metamask.dev: mkdir -p extensions && rm -rf extensions/* && cd extensions && ced nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknn && mv nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknn metamask
scripts.download.metamask.prod: mkdir -p your-app/dist/extensions && rm -rf your-app/dist/extensions/* && cd your-app/dist/extensions && ced nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknn && mv nkbihfbeogaeaoehlefnkodbefgpgknn metamask
scripts.build: npm run download.metamask.prod && npm run copy.metamask.prod && yarn dist
scripts.build.linux: npm run download.metamask.prod && npm run copy.metamask.prod && yarn dist -l
scripts.build.win: npm run download.metamask.prod && npm run copy.metamask.prod && yarn dist -w
scripts.build.mac: npm run download.metamask.prod && npm run copy.metamask.prod && yarn dist -m
scripts.build.all: npm run download.metamask.prod && npm run copy.metamask.prod && yarn dist -wlm
